p.k: The Groom Jason Jones and Natalie Zea star in this acclaimed unpredictable and all-too-honest comedy about the chaos that erupts during a couple's thousand-mile road trip with the kids.
p.d: In this comedy created by comic super-couple Jason Jones and Samantha Bee and inspired by their own experiences with family trips Jones stars as unfiltered dad Nate who hits the road with his wife and kids. Every leg of their trip is fraught with disaster as they encounter one hellish turn after another.
